entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
